name: PokerWar
description:
This is the final version of an old game I partially made for a gamejam and later for some youtube tutorials. 
The game plays like texas hold'em without betting rounds.  You get three hole-cards, one of which you must select to play WAR with (high-card wins, deuces beat aces).  If you or your opponent loses they lose a heart.  If either loses all three hearts they die and the game ends.  If both players live, the cards are evaluated like a Texas hold'em poker hand.
